cpId = '250120170345096ID1CP7968418', filename = 'nsdl_string_amount', records = 3, token = 'H4mHjn1kaOj5FFs8YOtI/PLAuGokrdVpUpcGvffdRFw=', load_amount = '101'
count = 3

    @staticmethod
    @allure.step("Verify gift card creation with invalid load amount")
    def verify_gift_card_creation_with_invalid_load_amount(cpId, filename, records, token, load_amount, count=1):
    
        response = GetCardProgramDetailsGetMethod.get_card_program_details_get_method(cpId, token)
        orgId = response.json().get("orgId")
        pre_balance = GetOrgBalance.getOrgBalance(token, orgId)
        with allure.step(f"Fetch card program details for card program ID: {cpId}"):
            cpDetails = GetCardProgramDetailsGetMethod.get_card_program_details_get_method(cpId, token)
            orgId = cpDetails.json().get("cardProgram").get('orgId')
            allure.attach(str(cpDetails.json()), name="Card Program Details",
                          attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.JSON)
    
        with allure.step(
                f"Generate bulk file for digital gift card creation: {filename} with {records} records and load amount less than 100 rupees"):
            file_path = CreateDigitalCardsFile.createDigitalCardFile(
                '/Users/shashikushwaha/Documents/workspace/c91_api_automation_ppi/constant/BULK_CARD_UPLOAD_FILES/Digital/',
                records, filename, cpId, token, load_amount)
            allure.attach(file_path, name="Generated File Path", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
    
        with allure.step(f"Send payload for bulk upload with file path: {file_path}"):
            response = DigitalCardCreationPayload.digitalCardCreationPayload(file_path, orgId, cpId, token)
            allure.attach(response.text, name="Bulk Upload Response", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.JSON)
    
        with allure.step(f"Measure time taken for bulk upload of {records} entries"):
            time.sleep(5)
            CommonMethod.timeTakenForBulkUpload(records)
    
        with allure.step("Fetch bulk upload details and validate the constraints"):
            bulkUploadId = response.json().get("bulkUploadId")
            allure.attach(bulkUploadId, name="Bulk Upload ID", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.TEXT)
    
            responseOfBulkUpload = BulkUploadDetails.get_bulk_upload_details(bulkUploadId, token)
            data = responseOfBulkUpload.json()
            allure.attach(str(data), name="Bulk Upload Details", attachment_type=allure.attachment_type.JSON)
    
            status = data.get("status")
            if (status.lower() != "failed" and count < 3):
                DigitalGiftCardCreationInBulk.verify_gift_card_creation_with_invalid_load_amount(cpId, filename,
                                                                                                 records, token,
                                                                                                 load_amount,
                                                                                                 count=count + 1)
>           assert status.lower() == "failed", "Bulk upload should fail for invalid amount"
E           AssertionError: Bulk upload should fail for invalid amount
